content:
Hi Gerrit

I was not able to successfully replicate the issue. I tried the below steps.

Tested on v13 and beta v14.03 with gmail imap connection.

1. Enabled phone's Aeroplane mode. (Network disabled) 2. Sent an email. (Send failure observed). 3. Moved the email from outbox to draft. 4. Checked sent folder. No email present. 5. Disabled phones's Aeroplane mode. (Network enabled) 6. Opened and sent the email in the draft folder. 7. Email sent successfully. 8. Checked sent folder. Only one copy of the email was present.

I also repeated the steps (skipping 1 & 5) with WAN access disabled on router.

For network outages you don't need to move the email away from the outbox. It will send when network connectivity resumes. I tested this also.

What was the reason your email failed to send? Did the error message specify? Are you been able to replicate both the send failure and email duplication in the sent mailbox?
